caption.center: TIMOTHY TILTON vs. UNION OIL COMPANY OF CALIFORNIA.

opinion.opinion_text:
Further appellate review denied.
Reported below: 64 Mass. App. Ct. 115 (2005).
MME. JUSTICE COWIN did not participate.
